product_name: Sony Action Cam Handheld Grip with LCD Screen
long_description: The Sony Action Cam handheld grip with LCD Screen transforms your Action Cam (sold separately) into a conventional camcorder format and lets you enjoy your footage on a rotating, 2.7 in. LCD screen. Rotating LCD display offers instant gratification, framing your shots and instantly playing back your footage. Enjoy easy control with built-in hard buttons to toggle between clips and view them. The Sony Action Cam handheld grip features a tripod hole on the bottom of the unit that provides universal tripod compatibility.
